title: AI is Eating the World, and Your Company is Just the Appetizer
description: What Benedict Evans’ latest “AI Eats the World” deck reveals about the gap between AI hype and real transformation, and what leaders must do next. Each deck is packed with sharp observations for anyone covering AI, building with it, or simply trying to surviv…
